mehi athulu wi durlabha ganaye aushadha warga laba ganimata sinhayagen awasara labune rawana rajuge duthayanta pamanak bawa da kiyanu labe.sinharajaya sinharajaya pura pathuruwagena siti anasakata wiruddha wu yodhayeku siti bawa da ohu wishala galwalin pahara di sinhaya mara damu bawa da kiyanu labe.sinhaya siti gallena sinha lena lesin da, yodhaya pahara dun gal ekathu wu thana yodhagalgoda namin warthamanaye di pawa pawathina bawa da kiyanu labe.sinharajaye pawathina shaka ha aushadha warga athara weniwal, rasakinda, ranaberaliya, gal weralu, beraliya, thiniya, batuna, kina, hadawaka, malaboda, diyana, kithul aadiya da we.
